api.name: ObAutocompleteComponent
api.usage: Can be imported with ObAutocompleteModule. ObAutocompleteComponent implements the ControlValueAccessor. You can use it like a custom form control directive that integrates with Angular forms.

inputs.name: noResultKey
inputs.text: Translation key for the message displayed when the option list is empty. There will be no message if noResultKey is provided with an empty string.

inputs.name: autocompleteOptions
inputs.text: Options to display in the autocomplete.

inputs.name: filterRegexPattern
inputs.text: Input to override the regex pattern used for highlighting text of the options. In customised regex patterns, the string 'textToFind' marks the location where the entered input text will be. e.g: [textToFind]{2} only highlights oo in 'Baloo' and not the single o like in 'Dragon'.

inputs.name: filterRegexFlag
inputs.text: Input to override the regex flag used for highlighting text of the options.

inputs.name: highlightCssClass
inputs.text: The class used to highlight options that match the input text.

inputs.name: optionIconPosition
inputs.text: Sets the position of the icon of every option if the iconName in ObAutocompleteInputOption is defined.

outputs.name: selectedOptionChange
outputs.text: Emits the selected option when an autocomplete option is selected.
